meanings.sent1: My biweekly haircut appointment is on Fridays.
meanings.sent2: The biweekly newsletter is sent out on Mondays and Thursdays.
meanings.sent3: I always look forward to my biweekly movie night with friends.
meanings.sent4: The biweekly staff meetings seem to come around faster each time.
meanings.sent5: The biweekly garbage collection helps keep the neighborhood clean.

meanings.sent1: Her biweekly yoga classes are on Mondays and Wednesdays.
meanings.sent2: The biweekly soccer matches are always intense.
meanings.sent3: I struggle to keep up with my biweekly gym sessions.
meanings.sent4: The biweekly visits from the in-laws can be exhausting.
meanings.sent5: The biweekly rain showers make the garden flourish.
